name: Miguel ALICIA, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Alicia v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Miguel ALICIA, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 1176
Miguel ALICIA, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 78 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 25, 2008.
